document.full_text: lindsey vonn's hopes of a fourth successive overall world cup title were left at the mercy of the weather after she lost the lead to maria riesch on friday with one race to go.
document.title: lindsey vonn's title chances at mercy of the weather
lines_and_colors: lindsey vonn's hopes of a fourth successive overall world cup title were left at the mercy of the weather after she lost the lead to maria riesch on friday with one race to go.
